SEARCH
Package org.spaceinvaders.classes

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
org.spaceinvaders.classes.Scene
Direct Known Subclasses:
Shop
public class Scene extends Object
Game scene.
Holds list of IGameObject
Used to quickly swap between scenes

    • update

      public void update(double deltaTime)
      Updates all game objects in the scene.
      Uses delta time to maintain same game speed on slower PCs or in case of FPS limit change
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - time since last update in milliseconds.
